attributes.title: No❤️😹
attributes.review: The app took around 69 full days to download and once I opened it, I found out that it was in fact run my the trump administration. Very disappointed

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: There are so many apples on this app. Everywhere I look there’s and Apple. I’m allergic to apples. Very disrespectful and unfortunate that the developers of this app and Donald Trump himself don’t care about us apple allergy people.

attributes.title: This app is HORRIBLE 10/10 would NOT recommend
attributes.review: This app is trying to turn us into North Korea. I would really love it if this country remained as a democracy rather than a dictatorship.
